Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: MA
Reviews.Content: Buy it!  You won't regret it!  Pictures are crisp and bright.  Quality is excellent, and this is coming from a Canon user.  Thanks, Nikon!

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: budmen
Reviews.Content: Camera really zooms and is user friendly I dont know much about tech stuff but this is a breeze to use. I mostly use for wildlife when hunting but takes some nice portrait pics too

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great and crystal clear pictures. I will recommend the camera for only people that enjoys taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Brains-
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning how to use everything correctly on this camera but so far I have been able to take some nice shots indoors & outdoors.I was very impressed with how well the camera actually performs in bad indoor lighting, I took several pics in poor lighting of a running/playing child that were actually usable in the cameras 'manual mode' without even fully knowing what all the settings did and now that I understand a bit more about the camera I know I could of taken even better shots in the same conditions.For a Non-DSLR this camera suits my needs perfectly, I'm happy with it for the 350-400$ price it was when I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Great Digital Camera!
Reviews.Author: cherie
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  Love the picture quality.  Used the video at a basketball game. I would tell a friend or a family member to purchase this!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: MelLopez "MelLo"
Reviews.Content: This is my first slr camera and I have to say, though it wasn't my first choice, it surprised me. It has an awesome zoom and it has a lot of dslr functions. It's great for beginners because it's easy to use (in my opinion).You can take great quality pictures and videos with it; however, in low light scenes, it struggles with the focusing. It's smaller than I expected, which I consider a plus; great grip, and the color red gives it more style and stands out!I wouldn't change it for any other camera. I don't regret having choosing Nikon P510 instead of the Sony DSC-HX200V

Reviews.Title: Review and question
Reviews.Author: Ann Walli
Reviews.Content: The camera has taken excellent pictures.  It was recommended by someone in our photography club here in Sun City, Hilton Head.However it arrived without a cord for the lens cap.  What should I do about this?Otherwise everything else is fine.Ann Wallidonann@sc.rr.com

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Awesome Camera.  Took some pictures in pitch black settings, put on the night time scene setting, and the picture came out picture perfect as if I had the room surrounded with lighting.  A definite recommended buy to anyone looking to upgrade from the regular point and shoots, but don't want to shell out the cash for those digital SLR.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Anh Vu Phuong Do
Reviews.Content: Price is ok and this is the product that it has many useful functions.I have used it many times and I really like this product.Especially the zoom function and video.However, only 42X zoom, so I'm still looking for products with better zoom conditions.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Naija babe ATL
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. Haven't used it to its full potentials and yet loving it so far. User friendly and makes u feel like a pro.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: anas
Reviews.Content: Excellent.Zoom is very excellent. The well-priced compared to their counterpartsMany imaging conditions. Suitable for personal photography and landscape photography

Reviews.Title: Camera i bought
Reviews.Author: Akbar
Reviews.Content: Fantastic camera. I see a SLR in the form of Digital camera. I love it. It was a fantastic. Video and quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: the video is poor
Reviews.Author: Fernando Manuel Ibarra A
Reviews.Content: the  camera is ok have a lot of functions but the video i d'not like because donot have pause when you put stop start again in other frame

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera, good quality pictures
Reviews.Author: Johal
Reviews.Content: I never use Nikon camera before, This one is really kool camera, I like the picture quality, very easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: One word Awesome
Reviews.Author: Raul
Reviews.Content: This was an anniversary present for my wife and she absolutely loved it.I would so recommend this to camera to someone else. My wife can't stop taking picture.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. I like the optional viewfinder which is extremely helpful in sunlight. Great zoom feature. Very good purchase!One negative - the battery only lasts for about 100 photos, and when I'm traveling I often take 400 photos in one day. Takes over 4 hours to recharge.

Reviews.Title: Was I surprised?
Reviews.Author: Rita F. Ashley
Reviews.Content: I expected this camera to be good, but not this good. The image quality is terrific. No idea why one would use the 42x zoom, but it is fun to play with. Camera is easy to use and a good point and shoot for travel and snap shots.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Victors Valiant
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  This camera is fun to use and has a great feel and great features and terrific zoom and lots of extras

Reviews.Title: Great camera... but no SD card, no case, really?
Reviews.Author: Lily
Reviews.Content: Great camera, I test-drove it on a friend's P510 before buying. Love the many great options & awesome zoom. Except nothing else was included. I've bought cameras before & they always came with case & SD card of some sort. Not this one. Well, I guess the case could be a bit expensive sometimes but a cheap 8GB or less SD card could have been included & avoiding a bit unhappy customer like me. C'mon Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera with Lots of Zoom
Reviews.Author: S. K. Bhatia
Reviews.Content: I have a Nikon D90 SLR which I love but its too heavy on my long travels and requires an extra lens for any significant zoom photography. So I bought this P510 with 42x zoom lens. I like it so far as I have not used it very much. The only con I have noticed is that the zooming switch zooms the lens too fast. Perhaps I need to practice so that it does not move so rapidly. One big pro is that the menu is very intuitive.

Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: Luis Partone
Reviews.Content: This camera is really what I was looking for.The 42 X and the electronic viewfinder are great.I must learn how to do the slow motion record (i didn't read all the instructions already) but there is a difference with de P500.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Usability
Reviews.Author: Bob Schmidt
Reviews.Content: I really like the usability of this camera.  I took a mini photography class to learn some of the basics, and I would suggest the same for other novices.The only limitation I've seen so far is the limited aperture range, but for my shooting, it's not a major problem.

Reviews.Title: Loving muy new camera
Reviews.Author: Ivanka "Ivanka"
Reviews.Content: I really like it, I think Nikon is the best brand for cameras and this one is really good for those one who are trying to enter in the world of photography

Reviews.Title: Very user friendly
Reviews.Author: N. Thomas Ryan
Reviews.Content: An amateur and I could take amazing photos the first day.  Do download and skim manual to benefit from non-obvious features.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tasha
Reviews.Content: I am by no means a professional, but this camera is AWESOME!!!!!!!First it came in the time that it said it would....yay Amazom! Secondly, right out the box it was charged and ready to go!  I was so concern reading some of the comments, but it is so not true....It DOES have a lens cap. a guide, and a strap!I have only had this camera for a few hours and have fallen in love!!!!

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: todd deane
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a Canon 36 op zoom camera previous to this one and the Nikon crushed the Canon in quality.  Zoom is great without a great disturbance in picture quality.  Overall, really good pics from a high zoom camera (which is somewhat rare).

Reviews.Title: Everything you'd expect
Reviews.Author: dalefty75
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife. I have a D-90 and for a quick shooter, I am seriously considering this as a back up camera. It's well worth the price and if you have a knack for photograpy want to move up to the next level of quick shooter. This will be a great investment as and probably even better then a low budget DSLR.

Reviews.Title: nikon Coolpix P510
Reviews.Author: Gail Turner
Reviews.Content: Like my new camera a lot. Use it often. My first camera was a brownie, which my mother gave me over 50 yrs. ago. Still have it. the new cameras are amazing and all the things you can do with them. The fact that the young gorgerous Ashton Kutcher  advertises it did help with my decision.

Reviews.Title: lovin my new camera
Reviews.Author: sandi angel
Reviews.Content: boy am i lovin my new camera.  each day i find something new to photo and find new ways to enhance them.  the quick start manual did show me how to put the camera and lens straps on plus how to load and charge the battery but i had to run to town to buy the memory stick.  plus the book just pointed out a few things and not how to use them, like the fn button.  i would suggest to all to go to the "User's Manual" online and print out the pages--which i did (all 175).  i then took it to town to Bose and punched holes for a binder and bought the 3 ring so all is safe.  now all i have to do is get my 'book' out and read.  i can't say enough about this camera--it's amazing and what i think is brilliant is the 42 X zoom.  i've gotten pictures of birds i never thought possible.  i can see this camera in my life for many years to come.  Great Job Nikon!!

Reviews.Title: A Perfect Camera to go with
Reviews.Author: Saravanan Chinniah
Reviews.Content: Awesome Pic, Lot of Options, Great user friendly, Love to see the world thru this. A Nice fully loaded point and shoot camera for the people like capturing the landscapes

Reviews.Title: Coolpix P510 perfect camera, but why no charger?
Reviews.Author: Alfred J. Padilla
Reviews.Content: As an avid amateur (and inveterate gadget freak) I've owned a host of film and digital cameras over the years. I needed a camera with a wide range of focal lengths and features, including macro, wide-angle, and extreme telephoto (orangutans don't like lenses in their faces).  Great camera, and the high MP allows further cropping and enlargement.While I've got a Sony NEX5 with the monster lens, I needed something a bit more flexible, as an upgrade from my old Konica/Minolta A200.  This machine fits the bill.The only negative on the Coolpix P510 package is that it does not come with a "real" charger.  You can charge the battery in the camera, but that's really inconvenient.  You can get 200-250 shots per battery, and the batteries themselves are dirt cheap compared to others.  However, it would really be a better idea if they just charged another 10 bucks and included a charger.  3rd-party charger plus a slightly lower capacity (1000 mAH rather than 1250) battery is only about $12 and change, on Amazon & elsewhere.  I didn't order one initially because the one on the Amazon website looked like it was only for use in a car, and "everyone knows" that cameras come with chargers. What you get instead is a wall adapter and USB cable, which plugs into the camera for recharging. Doable, but a bummer if you're on a trip.  The batteries are very small, not much bigger than an SD card (!), so be sure you own several if you plan to take lots of photos.Overall, 4.9999 stars, so I rounded up to 5.AlNikon COOLPIX P510 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and GPS Record Location (Black)

Reviews.Title: Graet Camera!
Reviews.Author: WestTnDawg
Reviews.Content: I love it. Easy to operate and get some great shots with the 42 power zoom. I bought a monopod to help stabilize it during high power zoom shots and have gotten some unbelieveable deer shots.

Reviews.Title: A very good camera
Reviews.Author: Christopher Katko
Reviews.Content: I've only had this camera since Black Friday, but so far it's been very good. The 42x zoom is absolutely amazing to play around with. Compared to my photographer friend's "standard" zoom lens on his DSLR, the Nikon had both wider angle view (from no zoom) and better maximum zoom.Quality wise? It's not a DSLR. It's not going to be "as good as" one. That being said, for the price range, it's a very good detail camera with decent macro ability, good video capture, and a very good zoom lens. If that's what you're looking for, it's a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Like a Pro
Reviews.Author: Berny
Reviews.Content: For what it does is a bergain, little, light weight, very good quality and picture noise is more than decent. I have recommended some family and friends to buy it and they are very please with it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Flavia
Reviews.Content: Good price and beautiful pictures. Great product quality! ... I love it! The delivery time was even better.I bought one for me and one for my sister.

Reviews.Title: Great !
Reviews.Author: Becca lyn
Reviews.Content: So Far it has been great.  Working alot right now and haven't been able to play with it much, but I like what I have seen thus far.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Serena "Serena"
Reviews.Content: My favorite part is that when you use the "auto" feature, you still get great pictures and fast shutter speeds.

Reviews.Title: so good
Reviews.Author: elizabeth winter
Reviews.Content: The product is very good and a good price even. It has excellent features similar to a professional camera, but more easy to use

Reviews.Title: Best price / performance ratio
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Triana
Reviews.Content: A Very good Bridge camera with lots and lost of functions. Allows to take great pictures in manual mode. The optical zoom is impressive.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: A2J
Reviews.Content: I love the zoom of the Camera, I don't have to walk far to capture objects from a distance, very useful and the battery life too is good. I have not been able to use the GPS facility on the Camera, maybe I am yet to read the manual enough to understand how the GPS works.

Reviews.Title: ESPECTACULAR
Reviews.Author: WARRIOR
Reviews.Content: CAMARA MUY COMPLETA Y A LA VEZ SENCILLA, CON MULTIPLES MENUS PARA ESCOGER Y SELECCIONAR INFINIDAD DE  OPCIONES PARA DAR FOTOGRAFIAS DE GRAN CALIDAD.LA RECOMIENDO 100%

Reviews.Title: new photographer
Reviews.Author: Berner lover
Reviews.Content: just got this camera for one heck of a deal.  i got it because i wanted a camera that would work well for a beginner like me.  lets just say that it is amazing.  the 42x zoom really works, and does not blur at that zoom.  on top of that, once the picture is taken you can zoom it in even more while editing it!  also, works wonders at night,  does not blur the lights out and shows crisp pictures of even the surrounding areas that are darker.  i cant believe how well it works actually.the only downside is that is doesnt come with a memory card or anything, but i just swapped the one from my old camera and it works.  came charged too so i took it out and used it right away!

Reviews.Author: Visa "kebatspeed"
Reviews.Content: I am having so much fun with my new camera, amazing in every way...best looking camera ever...thank you so much!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: sexymo
Reviews.Content: great camera, however don't by the add ons in the suggestions box! they don't fit! i bought some add on filters and a micro lens and they don't fit. the filters go with the add ons but they both don't fit on the camera! :(

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Carl E Johnson
Reviews.Content: great zoom range, very flexible exposure options,a fun camera anyone can use,the forty two times zoom range is unreal great camera

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Edwin Jurado
Reviews.Content: VERY NICE CAMERA... NOT A PROFESSIONAL ONE BUT YOU CAN TAKE VERY NICE PHOTOS WITH A LOW BUDGET... IF YOU WANT SOMETHING BETTER TRY NIKON COOLPIX L810

Reviews.Title: So far all good!
Reviews.Author: S. Tsang
Reviews.Content: It's been a little over 3 months; all I can say is every time I shot photos with friends and family, I received good feedback on the results. One thing I am not very happy about is now - my daughter is using my P510 instead of her own. But the good news is that the camera is still working as new after she returned it to me. Now, that alone worth 5 stars. Oh, I haven't tried shooting video yet. SUGGESTION - before you give a bad review, shoot some photos for others and get their opinions too; even though you are not as blind as I am, or better yet, let your young ones use it for a day or two to see how it holds up :) just kidding (in fact, hide your camera from them if you can).

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: JuanDiego Maldonado
Reviews.Content: I took some pictures from Andes. The resolution is very good... The zoom.. It's amazing. The automatic mode is exceptional intuitive; with user mode you can modify wherever you want...

Reviews.Title: Great for low light
Reviews.Author: elizabeth p barker
Reviews.Content: I have a nikon D7000 and D90.This camera is great in low light, way beyond my expectation.It has a great zoom. It does hit a little light so I use the compensation mode a lot.

Reviews.Title: Muy buena!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: karin brogle fenner + concha
Reviews.Content: Me gusta mucho la cámara. Muy buenas fotos y además el color rojo es fascinante!!!!!!! Recién una amiga se compró la misma!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: I am a photographer and I told myself that I was going to buy a DSLR camera and I shopped around for awhile and came across this one in the store and it was expensive so I looked online and Amazon was the cheapest. It works great, when I print them out they come out great and I love the GPS feature because when I upload the pictures it tells me where I took the pictures. The only thing I don't like is the way it switches over to video. There should be another button or be able to hit the shutter button like a usual camera.

Reviews.Title: great zoom
Reviews.Author: goga
Reviews.Content: Wow i'm impressed, this thing has the best optical zoom i've ever had. It takes good pictures but videos aren't so good.

Reviews.Title: Excellent photos
Reviews.Author: mannu
Reviews.Content: Took the camera for a test at a local park. I managed to get great clear pictures. I used it in areas with poor lighting and the pictures came out OK. The zoom is fantastic. The only drawback is the GPS. It took too long to pick the GPS, so I just turned it off and concentrated on taking photos. The video quality is very good just don't focus when taking a video as the lens movement will be heard and I am not talking about the background noise. All in all for an amateur like me it's suits me.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: L. Casto "hobojack1"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace my Panasonic FZ 28.  I take A LOT of pictures [1000's every year]. I was a little hesitant about buying this camera because of a few of the negative comments I saw in some of the reviews, especially regarding the video and sound. I am really pleased with the photo quality and the video/sound quality. I've been using this camera for a month now and just haven't anything negative to say about it. I absolutely love the 42X zoom! It's a great camera for the $.

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera.
Reviews.Author: Pedro
Reviews.Content: Easy to handle and excellent reach the target.The zoom is powerful.Good stability, high resolution and very good special effects.

Reviews.Title: Loving it so far !!!
Reviews.Author: Wendalina Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: It was between a Canon and Nikon. I was looking at the Canon t3i however found it to be too bulky. The removable lense was a plus but I asked myself if I would ever purchase additional lenses for the camera and determined that I would not. So it was between the Canon SX40 and the Nikon P510. Visited the near by best buy to get a feel for both and Nikon won. I also fell in love with the red colored option I had. Still learning process but so far so GREAT !!! Ordered it 11 pm and had it the very next day at 7pm. Awesome shipping speed. Thanks Amazon and A1 Courier.

Reviews.Title: Nikon for everbody
Reviews.Author: Harri
Reviews.Content: Great camera for everybody across the spectrum.  Old to Young, Amature(sp) to Professional.  So far easy to operate and understand its capability.  However, since the price is so good, you have a poorer quality camera body that may not stand up to rough treatment.  However, I am not going to test that issue, as I LOVE to camera to much.  Harry

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera at a great value!
Reviews.Author: April
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for an upcoming vacation and I've been thrilled at the photo quality on this!  I had been using a Sony Cybershot point and shoot for my normal hiking excursions but wanted something with more range for vacations....and this does not disappoint!  Amazing!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Universal Capacitive Stylus Pen for New Apple
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT CAMERA, VERY NICE PHOTOS AND PICTURES, EXCELLENT ZOOM AND EASY TO USE IT, I 'M VERY HAPPY TO HAVE BOUGTH THIS CAMERA

Reviews.Title: Best travel camera EVER!
Reviews.Author: never_enuf_shoes
Reviews.Content: Easy to grip with one hand, light, zoom is awesome when you are traveling! Battery isn't too bad unless you take a lot of video - bring and extra battery or two.

Reviews.Title: P510 Rocked in pictures but video's sound is not that catchy
Reviews.Author: Vishu
Reviews.Content: i got this cam recently, no doubt it has amazing zoom capacity and can take great pictures HANDHELD at full zoom. however i observed 2 things while shooting videos.At pin drop silence, the sound of lenses going in/out will be recorded in video mode. do u think its too sensitive? No, i used this cam to record a concert performanance, guess what video is cool but i dont know whats wrong but sound caught during video is very less...Moral of the story is: its the best cam available in market at this price for still images.oh yes, and it can take 220 pictures at one full battery charge, provided you see thru viewfinder and do not use flash. battery,, all of a sudden says exausted and shuts cam off, it wont blinks or warns before shutting down...

Reviews.Title: Meets all expectations
Reviews.Author: bludvl
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I do wish it was a bit lighter. But the strap comes in handy. Easy to use andgreat battery life. Takes wonderful pictures in macro mode. Definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great so far!
Reviews.Author: P. Keenan
Reviews.Content: We've had the camera for a little more than a month so far and we really like it. My wife wanted a small camera that was easy to use. I wanted a camera we wouldn't quickly outgrow. This camera takes beautiful pictures. The zoom is amazing. We haven't really given it a workout yet but that will be coming soon with a baby on the way.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX P510
Reviews.Author: Miguel Lodeiro
Reviews.Content: WOW ... For Me, I Just Think This Camera is The Top of the Jar!!! It Is Amazing ... Excellent Digital Camera is a Fewer words to describe it!!! My daughter has the Canon SX30IS but I do Like Much More this Nikon P510. You Won't regret to have it. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Good but....
Reviews.Author: Rick L. Bearfield "moviecritic"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera mainly for its gps function, long zoom, and panorama functions.  The gps system was extremely disappointing, I hike and backpack and always wanted to know my precise location. I did a short 7 mile hike and the gps unit lost satellite half way through the hike and never did regain the signal even under clear skies, my personal gps unit never loses tracking.  Why pay for this function when it is not reliable. Tried using panorama stitch assistant, this when compared to my older canon, was very hard to see in bright light.  Cannot zoom the when using the move the camera panorama function.  Tried this camera out for about a month but was not overly impressed.

Reviews.Title: No Filters Allowed on Coolpix Cameras
Reviews.Author: Bill G.
Reviews.Content: None of the Coolpix cameras allow a screw-on filter.  Most camera enthusiasts know the importance of putting a filter on the lens to protect it from scratches.  Usually a simple UV or skylight filter is used for this.Some of the Coolpix cameras appear to have threads on the lens that appear to take a filter.  This very deceptive, because those threads in fact do not allow a filter.  This was confirmed to me via a phone call to Nikon.  The only exception is the Coolpix 7700.  Nikon tech support believes the inclusion of digital filters built into the firmware of the camera are sufficient.  But digital filters will not protect the lens from scratches.  When your lens gets a scratch, you have to send the camera off to Nikon to get it fixed or buy a new camera.In the Nikon camera series, you have to get an SLR $$$$$ to take a filter, the Coolpix 7700 excepted.

Reviews.Title: Early Review on Nikon Coolpix P510
Reviews.Author: K. Hinson "KDH"
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for a trip to Tanzania next month. I am happy with it's capabilities so far and I am excited to try it out on the wildlife.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix P510 Great
Reviews.Author: Tay
Reviews.Content: The Nikon Coolpix P510 is so much better than my Canon SLR Rebel.  This camera takes great pics with or without a flash.  I always need a flash with my Canon.  The only thing I don't like about the camera is the way of charging the battery.  If you don't have a charger you charge the battery with a cable connected to the camera and a plug adaptor.  But the price and workmanship of the camera is great.

Reviews.Title: Just what I need
Reviews.Author: Tarek Ismail
Reviews.Content: Just what I need, if you are looking for a semi professional with excellent photos just buy this one.My daughter was looking for such one, she is novice but needs professional output, so after scanning the market there was 3 cameras to choose between:- Nikon COOLPIX 510 16.1 MP with 42x- Canon SX40 HS 12.1MP Digital Camera with 35x- Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP with 30xOur choice was Nikon for its 42X zooming, 16.1 MP, flexibility of the LCD as that is essential for my daughter ( I forget to tell you that we are Egyptian live in Cairo - Egypt and have a lot to record since the Jan, 25th revolution.)The camera is amazing, shots with the 42X zoom is stable and easy to take without Tripod but do not forget to buy additional batteries (I already did) as the original battery will not last for long specially when you use the LCD mainly for taking shots and review them.

Reviews.Title: coolpix p510
Reviews.Author: kelly
Reviews.Content: love this camera. i had a coolpix L110 that i liked and will give to my daughter but i wanted something a little more and this camera has it.

Reviews.Title: Doesnt' Charge - Sent back Twice Now
Reviews.Author: Greg Stuart
Reviews.Content: What more can I say.  Sent back twice now because it won't take a charge and/or won't turn on.  Ugh.

Reviews.Title: Great camera...
Reviews.Author: Hundszipfel
Reviews.Content: ...if you know how to use it. i had a bit of troubles when i first received it but turns out I was looking at it from the wrong side. That explained all the weird self portraits. Every since I am holding it right I have a blast taking pictures, I also like the color, Black is always in, can't go wrong there. I just read about shutter speed and still have to manage to stop it with my stop watch but I am thinking it is pretty much within the range.The best feature is that it does not steal your soul. you can take pictures without the worries of having stolen someones soul.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Bruno Morais Ribeiro
Reviews.Content: I'm loving this camera. I've done 2 big trials with that: one on beach side and another one in europe. On both situations the pictures were great.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend!
Reviews.Author: Lynn Judah
Reviews.Content: Not being an advanced photographer, I wanted an easy to use, no fuss camera for a trip to Seattle, WA.  It was perfect.  Zooming was easy for all the great things to see in WA.  Pictures turned out high quality.  It was recommended to me by someone who knows allot about cameras.  Glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect online order experience
Reviews.Author: cheribe "Cherib"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this one day and it arrived on my doorstep the next day.  It is EXACTLY as described.  It was carefully packaged and the camera is my second Nikon p510, because I love this camera for the price point.

Reviews.Title: Blurry Video- Won't focus on or after Zoom
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: "Video only allows you to shoot continuously for a maximum of 30 minutes. Also, if you'd like to change focus or zoom while shooting video... don't get your hopes up. There are two focus modes; Full time and single AF. If you choose single, it will focus when it starts recording, then hold at that level. This is the only usable focus mode for video. If you enable full time AF, the smallest change will make the camera constantly re-evaluate, causing blurry to not blurry back and forth video. If you try to zoom while it is enabled, it will stay in focus while it is zooming, but stay out of focus as soon as you get to the point you want to be at. And you can't manually focus video either. There IS a manual focus feature for the camera, but it is a pain to use, even after you figure out how to change it to use the side rocker to control said focus." This is a quote from Robert Torttielo and my exact experience with this camera. Everytime I think of the blurry video of my granddaughters ballet recital I get pissed. I shouldn't have to search the net for a fix for this and then keep my fingers crossed that it works. I paid for a camera that that takes clear videos zooming in or out. I didn't get that.  Two stars because it takes some good pictures if your willing to learn a little photography and forego the auto settings,

Reviews.Title: Yes, its wonderful
Reviews.Author: Maximo
Reviews.Content: Macro focus its excelent!, and the zoom its very range range i like it and my famuly is very happy

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't buy again
Reviews.Author: ke
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera last year for a trip to Europe. The zoom is AWESOME, was able to get some really great pics using zoom. The sports setting works well except the time after the photos are taken, the recovery time I think is too slow can't move onto the next shot quickly. I am not a photographer and have no training which is I why I bought this camera instead of another one with different lenses where it would be a larger investment. I have been disappointed with many of my photos as a lot of them end up out of focus and I have to take multiple, which really annoys people. My bothers-in-laws phone took some better photos with better color and lighting correction, needless to say was not happy when we compared photos. When I get a photo in focus they usually turn out really well. Landscape pictures turn out well but camera doesn't take people moving very well unless you are on sports setting. Changing between the settings can be a little time consuming when you are trying to make multiple types of photos quickly. Before you use the camera spend a lot of time getting use to the settings, learning where they are and how to change them. Some of the features you can use are really cool, paint, b/w, single color only, etc.I would not buy this camera again and every time I use it and get bad photos I am 1. Mad 2. Embarrassed that such a "nice" expensive camera can that that poor of photos

Reviews.Title: Insanely Good
Reviews.Author: Better than McCarthy
Reviews.Content: I bought this on a lark while my wife was recuperating from major surgery and I had little else to do in a city far from home.  The images -- all hand-held, mind you -- were crisp and sharp at all distances and light conditions.  The low-light images of a building at least two-tenths of a mile away were stunning, unbelievable. Nikon's IS system will keep you smiling.

Reviews.Title: Nikon for the Young Photographer
Reviews.Author: R. Foster "Grieving parent"
Reviews.Content: I choose this camera for a grandchild graduation present from Middle School. It was more professional than a point and shoot, yet not a expensive DSLR. No interhangle lens wasn't a draw back. The weight and size was about right for a young girls hands, yet enough weight to make it steady when needed. She is just learning the features and is thrilled with the camera.A great camera for the budding and semi advanced amateur photographer. I gave this a four star since it didn't have interchangle lenses and lacked some of the high end capabilities.

Reviews.Title: A Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: Nikon makes a great camera,  I will all ways use Nikon and this Coolpix p510 is good like the new GPS they added this year,  Takes really clear photos, and has a nice zoom.  cant beat the price for what your getting.  I take photos for the paper and I have had more than one front page photos with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Moore
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera! Works great and takes great pictures. Zoom is incredible. I haven't had any issues with it yet, but have only used it three or four times. So I'm still experimenting with it to discover all of its features. Larger than a pocket size point and shoot, but smaller and almost as capable as a DSLR without the hassel of carrying extra lenses.

Reviews.Title: Good black Friday/Cyber Weekend deal
Reviews.Author: Sam "IQ"
Reviews.Content: Paid around $300 for this -- haven't been able to find anything similar for anything near this price!Has all of the expected features for today's cameras.  It takes a little getting used to.  Taking pictures indoors during Christmastime, it didn't think that it needed a flash; but without the flash many pictures were blurry.  I was surprised, and a little disappointed, that I could not focus my turning the lens manually.  You have to use the little "T -- W" dial for motorized focus, just like on a little point and shoot camera.I made  some short videos.  That seems to work fine.  I've seen other reviews that complain about cameras not keeping focus as they zoom during videos; seeing this as it is happening reminded me that this is true of video cameras too.  So, it is not really fair to count that as a negative.This review is being written after just a few months use, at 4 or 5 family gatherings.  There are still many settings that I have not tried yet.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Debra Murphy
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for over a month and have really put it thru the test . The functions are amazing. I know some comments have been about the battery life. The original battery that came with it was not showing the draining on the screen and I got fewer pictures with it. But I always buy a back up and the difference is amazing. On my back up battery I get over 650 pictures ( including movies) before my battery drains. The functions are amazing. All those setting. Your can shoot 5 shoots at a time, as in when a pet is walking, and you have over 15+ scene setting. You can also edit your movie in the camera and make a still picture from a shot in the movie. I have been waiting for this camera forever. The zoom lense is to die for. It will tell you if you have it out too far and will tell you when you need to raise the flash. The pictures are amazing... BUY THIS AND YOU WILL NOT BE SORRY....... Also Nikon support is really good.

Reviews.Title: Finally decided to go with this one.
Reviews.Author: R. Blessing
Reviews.Content: I had this camera and the Canon SX50HS together to compare them and finally decided on this camera.  Both cameras took excellent pictures and both seemed to have similar performance.  I had read that the Nikon took a lot of time to focus at the extreme zoom but the Canon did the same thing.  I took photos of a lot of the same objects, developed them at he same location, and compared them both.  I didn't see much difference but I'm not an "expert".  My final decision was based on some of the "extras" that come with the Nikon and the fact that I want something to take hiking with us and the Nikon is a little smaller and lighter.  I wish the Nikon had the ability to rotate the view screen 180 degrees to protect it like the Canon does and that it had some of the extras that the Canon does but I guess no choice is going to be perfect.I've been agonizing over making a choice but, like my wife said, "Either of these cameras will be great" and it won't be the last one I buy.  For me the Nikon P510 was the best fit and as a bonus it was over $130 cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix P510
Reviews.Author: First-To-Land "Starman"
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  I Have owned digital since the begining.  I bought this one for a family member who is unexpierenced with digital and wanted to have more than just the "point and shoot" type.  She is loving it.  I love it.  It takes EXCELLENT pics. It has so many options for just the right pic.  For the money and the quality I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: This rating is elegui its compliance
Reviews.Author: jonas
Reviews.Content: This rating is elegui its complianceI liked the way of working and effectivenessfriends are encouraged to use all

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal Quality
Reviews.Author: ThisJustin
Reviews.Content: For the photographer that wants high quality shots, but doesn't have the time to learn the art of photography. This is definitely one of my favorite cameras on the market today, but there are a few things you should know before buying.1. You will want to buy a second battery and a wall charging unit that doesn't require the camera to be plugged in for charging. This camera can be a great travel cam if you have all of the necessary items, but the charging convention is a bit strange.2. The presets on the scene function are not as extensive as some of the better Olympus products, and if you like a highly active wheel, you might be disappointed.Other than these two things, I love the camera- the image quality is solidly within the expectations for the price.

Reviews.Title: CoolPix510
Reviews.Author: mamayer63
Reviews.Content: Very Pleased with camera and Amazon.  Manual is a bit vague to all the features so we ordered the book that is out on it.

Reviews.Title: I liked!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Here
Reviews.Content: I liked the camera, the product was delivered on time, in perfect conditions. The only that I dislike is that the camera have to be connected for to be charged, should have a separate charger.

Reviews.Title: Great Features but too many blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: Matt Harris Payne
Reviews.Content: I like Nikon and believe in their products but this camera took too many blurry pics even when there was no zoom involved.  Unless your subject is holding perfectly still you can forget about it.  I returned it after two months (thank you Amazon).  I'm on the lookout for another camera and I'm not going to rule out another Nikon but i'm definitely ruling out this model.

Reviews.Title: Just right
Reviews.Author: Redrider
Reviews.Content: This camera is the perfect balance for me. It is not too heavy, so I won't leave it home. The zoom is tremendous. It takes a little getting use to focusing. I just keep clicking and I usually get a good shot out of the group. I love the red.

Reviews.Title: nikon p 510
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: An excelent digital camera. Nice weight and perfect zoom and size. I like the color and easy to use. I'm very glad whit her. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great outdoor
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great outdoor pics , not too good indoor , menu is outdated but really happy with this camera if not for the battery running down without warning would have given 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Case Logic case DCB-304 is too small!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The Case Logic case offered in this bundle is too small for the camera.  Any way you try and stuff the camera in this case is tough.  This bundle should be set up with a case that works!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: J&C;
Reviews.Content: Bought this as part of a wedding gift for my wife, nothing bad about this camera. Hard to believe I paid the same five years ago for an S3 IS.

Reviews.Title: SO DISAPPOINTED!
Reviews.Author: maskys "maskys"
Reviews.Content: After researching and trying out several different cameras to get nice and clear pictures of my children during sporting events, I honestly thought I had finally found the camera that was going to do the trick. I can't tell you how disappointed I am in this camera and the quality of pictures I am getting of basketball, wrestling, and EVEN cheerleading.  The color is poor, they are blurry, streaked, and very distorted.  I'm using the scene/sport setting for most of them. I've tried all types of different settings and modes; however, the result is always the same......junk!  I think I'm finally going to break down and buy the Canon Rebel t3i.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: anita andrew
Reviews.Content: It works great and is easy for a novice photographer. the pictures turned out perfect. I am very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Carol Lombardi
Reviews.Content: I bought it for a little camera to tuck in my pocketbook, and take quick shots.  A few things that I don't like about it is the strap mounts are narrow and I can only use a "stock" neck strap.  The second is the battery charger.  Otherwise it takes nice photos and is what I was looking for other than my cell phone camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix P510
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Stenger
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a Christmas gift.  Bought one last year for one of my girls. She loved it.  Hoping my youngest will love

Reviews.Title: New Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard K. Ransom
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera! It takes great pictures and looks good too! It takes great vidiaos also!Nikon is the Best!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix P510
Reviews.Author: Eric Gessel
Reviews.Content: I have taken over 300 photos and it was easy to use and great results. The camera came just as described.

Reviews.Title: Take pictures like a pro!
Reviews.Author: Kris Woodrum
Reviews.Content: Love my camera!  It takes amazing close up shots and is easy to use.  So much easier than purchasing a zoom lens separately.

Reviews.Title: Good camera,fantastic zoom.
Reviews.Author: SL
Reviews.Content: If you need a compact camera with a very long zoom, this can be the camera for you (or the new model, almost identical). I also bought the Panasonic FZ200, with a shorter zoom but a marvelous 2.8 fixed aperture. I like both cameras, would buy the FZ200 instead because of the faster lens.

Reviews.Title: Camera for my husband
Reviews.Author: Olivia Lang
Reviews.Content: This camera was a present for my husband who has never had a digital camera before. He loves this camera.

Reviews.Title: Not really adequate for birding.
Reviews.Author: KSATHELO "Helen"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking it might be a more reasonably priced option for birding pictures.  I have been somewhat disappointed in the ease of  use and the quality of the pictures I have taken so far.  It has been difficult to acquire the subject in either the viewfinder or the LED screen.  I'm hoping with more practice it will become easier-I would really like this camera to work for me so I don't have to spend big bucks on a SLR.

Reviews.Title: Just to say it is excellent.
Reviews.Author: ventarron
Reviews.Content: The price paid for this excellent camera is very small compared to the advantages it offers. I risked despite some negative comments, and found they must have been written by people who did not look a bit more, to address what they believed to be flaws in the camera. All apparent failures that some people say, have perfect solutions if you take a better look to the user manual.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Aris Konstantinou
Reviews.Content: You think that this is a camera for an amateur!. On the contrary, you can have anyone operate this camera. Even anb adnvanced photographer would find this a great tool to work with. The macro shots and the calrity of the picture is amazing, particluarly with very loiw light conditions.

Reviews.Title: Nikin Camera
Reviews.Author: Stiwar
Reviews.Content: I love my camera, for my it is best camera, This new model has a lot improvement. I like the color, it is very nice, it is cool

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Debz
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews on this camera before purchasing it and I also own a Coolpix 500 camera that I have had for quite a while and love too. The pics are clear and the zoom is great, altho it seems that the 500, even though it is a 36x zoom as opposed to the 510 which is a 42x, the 500 zooms in more. But either way, I am very happy with this camera

Reviews.Title: Len Zooming Software Glitch??
Reviews.Author: cgtennis
Reviews.Content: I just bought it for several days from Costco. It happened twice for me. When I was trying to zoom and focus on a  remote object, the len automatically zoomed by itself to maximum lenght without me touching the zooming control. Then the zooming control didn't respond at all. I have to power off the camera and re-power it on to make it work. This is probably a software glitch. I'm going to try it for a few more days and see how it goes.

Reviews.Title: Lindas fotos
Reviews.Author: EstebanHCG
Reviews.Content: Fácil de usar, muy buen precio para las características. El zoom 42X no es fácil de encontrar en otras cámaras. Disparando mucho el flash se necesita una pila adicional.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Javier Merino y Mª Dolores Pastor
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a few days ago and I am still getting used to it, but it seems to have lots of options to let you take the best photo. It has an awsome zoom (42x) and it is quite easy to use, although I am still finding new characteristics.The camera is very light and comfortable to wear. The only con that I find at the moment is that the internal memory is only 90MB, but it is easily solved by buying an external memory card.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Lopez
Reviews.Content: Waoo excellent camera. I loved it. The picture quality is very good and the same video. The construction of the camera feels solid, check quality materials. I recommend it. Only thing I did not like is that when you take video, the auto focus is very slow. Otherwise it is a good product. I compared this camera with the Canon SX50 hs and I think they are tied.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for beginners
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The only thing I wish it had was a share button so I could share my pictures more easily with social websites. Other than that its great for starters!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jose Danies
Reviews.Content: Muy buen producto y entrega a tiempo , lo recomiendo , calidad y servicio , very good, excelente . .

Reviews.Title: Great price for the quality
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Basham
Reviews.Content: The zoom on this thing is AMAZING.  I bought this camera because my sister had a similar one and I really liked hers.  This is a great camera for the price, and I'm happy with my purchase!  It's not even very heavy!

Reviews.Title: FOCUS
Reviews.Author: kim p
Reviews.Content: When trying to zoom it does not really focus in clearly. AND at night when you take a distant picture. The quality is poor.

Reviews.Title: i love it~!
Reviews.Author: donnetta
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NIKON....the zoom is great i bought a nikon ji last year and this surpasses it by leaps and bounds!

Reviews.Title: Nikon CoolPix P510
Reviews.Author: Jspind
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my wife for Christmas. She absolutely loves it!! Takes great pictures and the zoom is unbelievable. It is a great camera for somebody wanting to get into photography without paying a ton of money.. Plus she loves the fact it's red!!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix P510
Reviews.Author: Michelle Fairchild
Reviews.Content: Very happy so far with the camera, great zoom, easy to use.  Liked it so much I sold my D90 and will just use this.  Light weight, no lenses to change...

Reviews.Title: coolpix p510
Reviews.Author: Robert D
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera ad a Christmas present for my wife and it was right on the money. She loves the camera and likes the ability to change her settings. Awesome buy

Reviews.Title: Great Zoom, love it. Wonderful clear pictures.
Reviews.Author: Maurice M. McKercher
Reviews.Content: It's GREAT!!!!! LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT i REALLY DOOOOO! Yeah

Reviews.Title: MUY BUENA
Reviews.Author: RODRIGO ESTEVEZ
Reviews.Content: ESTA CÁMARA ES  ESPECTACULAR CUMPLE CON TODOS LOS REQUERIMIENTOS TOMA FOTOS SENSACIONALES Y LOS VÍDEO EN HD , ES SIMPLEMENTE ESPECTACULAR.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: David Heli Parrado Clavijo
Reviews.Content: EL PRODUCTO LLEGO OK, TAL Y COMO LO OFRECIERON ESTOY TOTALMENTE SATISFECHO CON EL MISMO.RECOMIENDO AL VENDEDOR ES BASTANTE RESPONSABLE

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: hugh williams
Reviews.Content: Actually, the camera was purchased for my wife, who seems to love it based on the way she carries it around. She now spends more time with the camera than me,

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: student
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my camera. It takes really good pictures, and it is really easy to use. I am looking forward to many events with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Memory card not included!!
Reviews.Author: Andrew Wilcox
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my wife to take pictures of our baby's first Christmas....No where does it say it doesn't come with at least a small memory card. So we could only take a few pictures with the camera's internal memory due to everything being closed that day!!

Reviews.Title: Liked the P510 before buying.......
Reviews.Author: janacoop
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this camera.I was not happy when I saw the "Made In China" tag because had I known this before I would not havr purchased.However, I called Nikon and they assured me that their products are quality equal no matter where they are madde.I am taking their word for it.I only received the camera days ago and have not had a chance to put it through its paces.

Reviews.Title: Purchased as a gift
Reviews.Author: gwen garling
Reviews.Content: It came as promised and my friend loves it! He had the previous version and wanted to move up. I just wanted a camera. So I bought it for him and he gave me his older one. A great product.

Reviews.Title: an excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: package came as product shown. brand new and in origianl packaging. got it really fast also. this is an xmas gift so i hope it works well for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Problem if you wear sunglasses with polaroid lenses
Reviews.Author: Buffycat
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera the Nikon P510 for about 2 months and love the photos it can take, but had not been able to use it outside extensively because of the heat in south Florida.  I just went to TN for a week and ran into a problem that I did not know existed with certain lenses.  I was at a state park in the sunlight wearing my sunglasses which because of a medical issue MUST have polaroid lenses.  When I was shooting in the horizontal mode using either the LCD screen or the viewfinder I had no problem.  However, if I tried to shoot a picture with the camera held vertically the LCD screen darkened and a criss-cross mark filled the viewfinder's field of vision.  At first I thought the camera was malfunctioning, but as I got deeper into the shaded part of the woods I took the sunglasses off and put my regular glasses on and both the LCD screen and viewfinder functioned properly.  I also own the Nikon P100 and have never had this problem with the P100.  Has anyone else experienced this problem when wearing Sunglasses with polaroid lenses?

Reviews.Title: Nikon P510
Reviews.Author: Ryn
Reviews.Content: A week after purchasing this camera I took it to Africa on a Missions trip.  The camera photographed for 10 days with no issues at all.  I photographed as we handed out food to the children that live in the dumps in Kenya, the climate was dirty and dusty.  With the Nikon Coolpix P510 I was able to cover the trip with no problems.  The last day in Kenya we went on a safari and the 42x Zoom really shined!  I was able to photograph all the animals we encountered up close without getting to close!  The male lion photos came out great!  Even at full zoom photos were still clear and sharp!  The only negative thing I can say is the battery/SD card cover could have been designed better.  I would like to see it lock tighter and more securely.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: 1) Just got this camera and used it....a lot.  42X crystal clear zoom and EXCELLENT pictures, especially in "auto", "scene" and "macro" modes, for this price...are you kidding me!2) Please, by all means disregard the foolish reviews comparing this EXCELLENT camera to $3000+ cameras with $1000+ extra lenses that can take a clear picture of a fly's moving wings from a mile away.  If you want the same picture results as the people sitting on the floor under the basketball hoop at a pro game, well be prepared to hand over $5000+!3) I also read complaints about the zoom being heard while video recording....are you kidding me....IT HAS A 42X ZOOM MOTOR....HELLO??.....anybody home upstairs?!  Here is a clue for the clueless...."If you want a video camera....buy a video camera....dummy!"4) Also, more clueless people complain about the 42X zoom taking too long to focus (like 2 to 4 seconds)...are you kidding me!  If you are in such a hurry....maybe you should find another hobby...like playing ping pong!5) Also,  do yourself a favor a disregard the foolish reviews comparing functions of similar cameras that the human eye can't even detect....are you kidding me!  I didn't know SUPERMAN was doing camera reviews!5) Do yourself a favor....buy this camera. You won't be sorry!6) LASTLY....did a mention disregarding the foolish reviews!....are you kidding me!

Reviews.Title: Nikon P510 Problem
Reviews.Author: Zia
Reviews.Content: I have this Nikon P510 since few months, I used in afew weddings of friends to take some picture for my self. I used almost all of its feature and setting, but I am facing one big problem that when I am taking pictures, it is all like a fish eye effect, I dont know if it is the camera problem, if everyone else faces the same problem or I have messed up the setting or those things. If someone knows about it, please let me know at seedaqat@yahoo.com, would like to get some information and expert idea about it, thanks.

Reviews.Title: noisy zoom?
Reviews.Author: California Woman
Reviews.Content: I won the Nikon Coolpix 12.1 and the zoom is both touchy and noisy.  Not great for videos.  I was hoping this camera would solve those two issues.  I like the idea of a more powerful optical zoom and the HD video clips.  But what can be done about a noisy or touchy zoom??

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: When they had a sell on this camera it was advertised to come with a camera bag and an SD card.  The price was great and the camera is great but the camera bag and the SD card never showed up.  I wrote to Amazon twice on this matter and never got an answer from them, or the bag or the SD card.  Might have been the old bait and switch.  Other than that the camera is great for what I do.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Tina LaFrance
Reviews.Content: Always leary about ordering online, but I love this camera.  I was sick of my old camera's giving me blurring bad pictures and felt I was missing out on saving my childrens memories.  This camera has not let me down once.  My favorite option is the continous shoot, which you just hold the button down and it keeps taking pictures.  I would definatly recommend this products to other moms.  It's a little big, but it was no shocker, since its not hidden about the size.

Reviews.Title: This is one great camera
Reviews.Author: R. Leech Jr.
Reviews.Content: This camera offers so many features that you used to get on upper priced SLR cameras that it is hard to believe that except for true professional photographers, one would need more.  As an amateur, the only problem I have is remembering how to find/use different features without having go go into the instruction book each time.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Spyder
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Got to use the camera on our last vacation. Camera is very easy to use in "auto" mode, gets a little complicated going "manual", didn't have a chance to go through the instructions. I absolutely love the 42x zoom. The battery seems to last forever. Very happy with it..

Reviews.Title: Nikon CoolPix P510
Reviews.Author: Joan F. Jones "JOANSIE"
Reviews.Content: Camera very nice but did not have the panoramic feature that I wanted after I talked to camera friends.  I bought a Sony DSC-HD200V instead from Amazon too.Accessories for the Nikon returned also but bought for Sony.  All transactions - purchase and return handled well.

Reviews.Title: I really like it!
Reviews.Author: In desperate need of coffee
Reviews.Content: I must admit after getting a iPhone with 8 megapixel and HD video I bought I was done with point and shoot cameras. However there have been many times i have missed one, such as when I am shooting in low light , long distance, sports, video for long clips , zoom on video ECT.....So when my daughter graduated from school and it was dusk my iPhone got crappy shots.I started looking into bridge cameras because i wanted the super zoom. I really like the way this camera performs for the price. It takes GREAT photos even with no flash and low light! Kids plays no problem sit in the back! My only drawback that takes it down to 4 stars is the flimsy feel to the camera......... But that aside it does it job way better than my phone!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product 100% Recommended
Reviews.Author: Alexander Castellanos "AlexanderC"
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product 100% RecommendedThe camera is not heavy, it is ergonomic, its design is very nice.The pictures are very sharp, the colors in the photos are highlighted even more than the original, the zoom is amazing, the speed of the footage is amazing, 3D photos are very good, video is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera and outstanding pictures
Reviews.Author: Stephen Conn
Reviews.Content: I'm impressed with the quality of the photos and the zoom is incredible. My only concern is accidentally damaging the lens.  Does anyone know what size filter is used on this camera?  I want to purchase a UV/Skylight filter to protect the lens but I can't seem to find the correct MM size.  Some say 52mm while others say 67mm.  The Nikon forum (web page) had asked this question and the Nikon moderator said that filters are not available for the P510.  If this is the case, why is there a thread opening on the lens. Any help or information would be appreciated.

Reviews.Title: disappointed with camera after reading so many reviews.
Reviews.Author: old timer
Reviews.Content: When I first saw my new Nikon P-150 I just knew I had finally found the ultimate camera. I have been doing outside photography since the old Argus C-3 days. I immediately went to the mountains and started taking landscape photos. I wasn't very satisfied, so when I got home I read the on-line manual. My next trip was a hard hike of five hours in rough country to photograph a remote old mountain ranch. What? Green/Orange grass? I must say I am very disappointed in this great looking camera. If you plan to do much outdoors/landscape photography you better keep looking for a good camera. Highly Over-rated is all I can say.As a back-up I had my pocket Nikon CoolPix S8200 and repeated each photo I took with the Nikon P-150, yes you guessed it, the CoolPix S8200 far out operformed the P-150 for quality.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix P510 digital camera
Reviews.Author: RRN
Reviews.Content: Ordered my Nikon Coolpix P510 camera; it was delivered the following afternoon.  Undeniably speedy delivery!I've had it three weeks and I'm still learning/experimenting with its many features.  The red body color rocks!  Looking forward to capturing great photos from this camera.

Reviews.Title: I am sure the issue can be corrected with a new camera
Reviews.Author: John Lawrence Green
Reviews.Content: I have a P90 and I love that camera so I sent my daughter this P510 in Hawaii. It is refurbished by Nikon and I have been told the refurbished cameras are a better buy than a new one because they have been gone over and tested by Nikon.  My daughter has contacted me and said the light meter does not work. I am upset about Christmas, but have requested a return label and promised I would send her a new one.  However, 510's are becoming scarce and again I have been told they are better than the 520. Hope for the best.

Reviews.Title: BUY THE EXTRA WARRANTY!!!!
Reviews.Author: T. Paune
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product (in red) at the beginning of the year on the 7th of Jan. Worked great, from the time i got out of it, it was a very good camera.One Con i had a bout it was just like other reviews that when zoomed far out it was harder to be able to focus on the object and sometimes just couldn't/wouldn't focus.If you are interested in long exposure pictures the longest that the shutter will stay open is 8 second, so not best for those super long exposure shots. The camera does work great all around and is a fast shooter camera with amazing diversity of settings really programmed into it alreadyReason its given 3 stars is because of the fact that (my own fault) left it sitting on a tripod for a long exposure shot and a gust of wind knocked it over, with only having it for 3 weeks the lens inside was knocked out and since was irreparable, finding out that a very easy fall can really damage it beyond repair. You would think that the camera could take a bit more wear and tear but it really can not handle much. The warranty works! Get it from square trade and they work with you the whole time and are a VERY good company to work with. Get the warranty else you want an easy fall to damage a $400 camera beyond repair, and if they can't repair it they will fully reimburse you, so while mine may of broken I already have another on the way.

Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: Esta es la primer camara digital que compro. Hasta ahora me seguía manejando con dos camaras reflex a negativo; Canon AE1 y Nikon FM2 excelentes las dos.Aun la estoy conociendo y familiarizando con los comandos, las funciones y los programas. Hay cosas que extraño de las otras, como el crear la fotografía que uno busca, o la posibilidad de intercambiar lentes. Esta puede resolver todo en automatico.No obstante toma fotos muy nitidas, tiene un zoom increible, es sencilla de entender el manejo.Muy recomendable

Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this camera and am getting used to it.  It will do everything I am capable of, hope to master it someday.

Reviews.Content: The camera arrived in prefect conditions. I have used it about ten times and have not have any problem. I have used the zoom to the maximum and even at this point quality is acceptable. Using a medium zoom distance they are very high quality. The camera is light, beautiful and easy to understand features. I have not used video yet. Thanks. I recommend this product without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Go Red!
Reviews.Author: Nucky
Reviews.Content: I received the red Nikon Coolpix P510 from Amazon today.  When you see that striking red color, you will realize that this is the camera that will get all the looks.  Just stare at its beauty while it is displayed on a table and you will be grateful that you chose the red model.  This camera takes amazing photos and the 42x zoom is an attribute that no other camera possesses.  Who wants a camera that is mundane and doesn't have that WOW! factor?  Go with the red and you will be the talk of the town.

Reviews.Content: I returned it to Davis as it was not working.  They said that I had used it and that it was a different serial number, so they are shipping it back to me.  This is unacceptable. Reviews.Title: Great portable flexible camera
Reviews.Author: John Thomson
Reviews.Content: I used the camera on a recent trip involving portraits, wildlife in the wild on the move, scenery, flower close ups and just great scenes.  It handled all.  The low battery indicator is not that obvious and did not appear to come on very long at all before shutting the camera down; but with two charged batteries never had to worry about shooting all day with GPS recording on (I would avoid GPS tracking because of the battery drain, as Nikon suggests).It would be nice if the A-GPS file updating could be done without removing the memory card; the A-GPS file must be kept up to date for any chance of reasonably quick GPS location acquisition.  The P510 got a GPS fix (with an up to date A-GPS file) faster than my 4 year old hand held Magellan Triton pure GPS device, but not as fast as my Droid Cell Phone (which "cheats" by using the location the cell phone carrier provides as an initial guess of location).  Nikon's software made it easy to check the GPS locations and then easily fix any poor GPS location info.The picture quality is all I could hope for and I will use it to add to the 50,000 pictures I have already taken.  It is small and light enough to haul all over (just don't get it wet).

Reviews.Content: Im going to take this camera to the beach when I get back to the states and taking pictures of all the beach hunnies. 4 stars beacuse it doesn't have PANARAMIC SHOT! really?

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Max "Max"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from Amazon, because Best Buy did not offer it in red in the stores.  As a result I saved money since I didn't have to pay a sales tax.  I also bought the accessories that they listed at the bottom of the page.  I will leave reviews on them as well, so that you can click on my user name and decide if they are right for you.Recommendation: If you decide to buy this camera and want to learn about the features, simply go to Best Buy and tell them you are thinking of buying the camera and have someone go through the camera's features with you.

Reviews.Title: Beware.
Reviews.Author: Newlpost "Newlpost"
Reviews.Content: I am not an easy video reviewer. Simple things annoy me. Even so, I don't think I can take a pill to make me say good things here. What really annoys me about this camera is a pair of oversights or defects. I normally use big Canon expensive stuff and so going Nikon was because I was nudged by the neat things this camera could do at low cost (and size). OK.Huge steady zoom. See? That's the BIG come on. Why this camera? Red? Geez. No. Big steady zoom. OK. But no manual focus and the bazillion feature autofocus that does so many things doesn't do the main thing - keep the camera in focus as you zoom. In fact if you zoom way in then you have about 50% chance of being hugely out of focus. Monkey focus? Shiny objects seem to distract the autofocus. So when the violinist is just off line of a trumpet, forget about getting her face.Fast speed video! Well who takes fast speed video? People who want stop action. Let's see if that ball was inside the line. Shouldn't fast speed video have a fast shutter speed? You'd think. I thought. No. Lots of motion blurred images. - AND _ the 120fps is 3:4 ratio. Ooot? Hmmm?OK how about the Progressive 1080 - progressive is a mode that screams stop action...sooo? No. Even slower shutter speed with horrible blur of moving objects. The STAR 1080p.. same.So it is a bridge camera after all. A slightly big camera that acts totally like a small useless camera. Nikon, be ashamed. Be very ashamed.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo Eduardo Martínez Ricci
Reviews.Content: All cool, I am lazy to write more about this, but it looks like you need some of my time so I will just say, I love you all :)

Reviews.Content: Panasonic DMC-FZ150K I brought, goes up to X127 zoom!You can see the whiskers on flies' nose, as a hundred yards!Or see the wart on the end of your wife's nose.  Whatever turns you on.  And it is cheaper, too.  You can do macroshots with it, too.  A great camera.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Compromise Camera
Reviews.Author: LarryinSanFrancisco "Larry"
Reviews.Content: This camera has been a huge disappointment.  I already had a digital Pentax SLR, but the old lenses I'd originally bought for a film camera body that died when a wave hit me in Antarctica didn't have any decent wide-angle settings.  I also already had an old, good, small Olympus point-and-shoot camera with a pretty good optical zoom.  I thought this would be a good compromise camera that wouldn't excel as much as either of them, but would do a better all-around job.  Boy, was I wrong -- it isn't even as good a camera as my phone is.  Zooming in tight invariably gets me blurry pictures, even using a tripod.  (There's no bulb feature, and MAYBE there is a delay feature -- if only the manual's instruction to "see page 39" were not a reference to a non-existent page in the paper manual.)  It quite often won't focus at all, and therefore won't take any picture AT ALL.  There's no macro setting, so very up-close pictures are also blurry and lousy.  The optics are terrible -- point this thing at a perfectly beautiful full moon, and the viewfinder will show it surrounded by a huge fuzzy halo that isn't visible with the naked eye, which was the biggest and most surprising disappointment of all, given the reputation of Nikon lenses.  Piece of junk, I'm sorry to say.

Reviews.Title: BEACH CAMERA & NIKON=EXTREME DIS-SATISFACTION
Reviews.Author: WOLVERINE 81
Reviews.Content: I WILL NEVER BUY FROM BEACH CAMERA AGAIN NOR ANOTHER NIKON. THE NEW CAMERA WAS MISSING A VERY INEXPENSIVE LENS COVER STRAP WHICH NIKON NOR BEACH CAMERA REFUSED TO MAKE GOOD ON. I DID NOT RECEIVE EVERYTHING I PAID FOR AND RECEIVED NO ASSISTANCE, JUST A BRUSH-OFF FROM THE MANUFACTURER AND SELLER.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Machi
Reviews.Content: I read every review I could find on this camera and found them overwhelmingly positive so I purchased it last week. I can't speak to all the technicalities as others have done. What I can speak to is results and disappointing they were. Overall, I found the colors washed out and most images out of focus even when the subject was 10 feet away and not moving. Images taken at the far end of the zoom were all out of focus, no matter what setting I used. I also found the battery life disappointing. After about 75 images, it was dead. I compare this camera to my little Panasonic Lumix - blew the Canon out of the water. I've returned the Canon and am going to try an upscale version of my Lumix. Nikon COOLPIX P510 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and GPS Record Location (Black)

Reviews.Title: I blew it
Reviews.Author: Trainer Lady
Reviews.Content: Based on all these great reviews and short time before leaving for work I ordered this camera yesterday morning because I have a vacation coming up. I have a Nikon D5200 and LOVE it but didn't want to bring the lenses and stuff. I paid $349.00 here, I wanted the red one but that would have been $50.00 more, so I got the black one. Now I see Primotronix has the RED one for $248.00!!!!!!!!!! Same exact camera and stuff, but $100.00 less.Darn it.I think I'll return the Amazon camera and buy the other red one.....I have time to do that before I leave.Crap.

Reviews.Title: Does not have a true orientation sensor: Returning!
Reviews.Author: G. Berenger
Reviews.Content: I feel so betrayed.This device portrays itself as a high end camera in its category, yet, it misses an essential feature that even the worst smartphone cameras have: an orientation sensor! Yes, this is a $400 device (retail...) that will force you to manually rotate the pictures that you take on the side! That's about 50% of the pictures we take.I'm so livid. The rest of the device is irrelevant. I'm returning this camera and all its accessories.Nikon, this is my 5th camera in 11 years, and I trusted your brand completely. It's over, I'll never buy from you again.

Reviews.Title: THE ABSOLUTELY WORST OF THE WORST

Reviews.Content: I UNPACKED THE CAMERA WITH GREAT EXCITEMENT.TIME TO TEST IT. SHOT WITH AND WITHOUT THE FLASH90% WERE OUT OF FOCUS, OUTDOORS TOO.THE VIDEO PART,...REFUSES TO FOCUS AND IT MOVIE JUMPS WHILE VIEWING.MINE GOES BACK. STAY AWAY FROM THIS TOTAL LOOSER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
